email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer the vessel OCEAN HORIZON for your iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Qingdao.

Cargo: 150,000MT Iron Ore
Rate: USD 22.50 per MT, CIF basis
Laycan: 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25
Demurrage: USD 20,000 per day

Please let me know if you need further details or wish to proceed.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider revising it to USD 20.00 per MT?

Also, could you provide the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your response. The OCEAN HORIZON has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300m. Considering your request, we can offer a revised rate of USD 21.00 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We are willing to proceed at USD 21.00 per MT. Could you confirm the laycan and provide the vessel's certificates and last 3 B/Ls?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Great to hear that! The laycan remains 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. I will forward the vessel's certificates and last 3 B/Ls shortly.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Iron Ore Shipment - Documents
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Please find attached the requested documents.

[ATTACHMENTS: vessel_certs.pdf, BL_history.pdf]

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Documents
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Documents received and reviewed. Everything looks good. Please proceed with the booking as discussed.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
